property.name: Race
property.value: Mecha Del Stella/Shinobi

property.name: Rules
property.value: {NINJA CHANGE} 3 (Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks or blocks, if during that attack you didn't use a Ninja ability, you may switch one of your Mecha or Shinobi that costs 3 or more with this creature from your hand.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, each of your other creatures get +3000 power until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM23-SD2 Start WIN Deck: Sacred Chaos Kunoichi Change

property.name: Race
property.value: Mecha Del Sol/Shinobi

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SYMPATHY}: Creature (This creature costs 1 less to summon for each of your creatures in the battle zone. It can't cost 0 or less.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, Mecha Mechraid 5. Mecha {MECHRAID} 5 - Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. From among them, you may use a Mecha card that costs 5 or less for no cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. ■ Whenever one of your creatures would be destroyed, you may destroy one of your other Shinobi instead.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Race
property.value: Mecha Del Stella/Shinobi

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER PLUS} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it for no cost. If it's your opponent's turn, and you have had 2 or more of your shields broken this turn, this creature gets its Shield Trigger Plus ability.) ■ Whenever you put a creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. {SHIELD TRIGGER PLUS}: When you put this creature, you may put a non-evolution light creature that has "blocker" from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Mecha or Shinobi from among them and add it to your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
